title: AI helps astronomers make a potentially major find - an exploding star being attacked by a black hole
description: Artificial intelligence helps astronomers observe what may be the first known case of a star exploding while interacting with a black hole.
content:
Artificial intelligence has helped astronomers observe what may be the first known case of a star exploding while interacting with a black hole, a new study reports.

title: AI chip startup Rivos seeks up to $500 million in funding to take on Nvidia
description: In the race to supply the hardware behind artificial intelligence, few names have risen as quickly as Rivos.
